citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
No records were available for review during this inspection. The program of veterinary care and animal inventory
records had been removed to an off-site location and could not be accessed at the time of the inspection. Records
required to be kept by the Animal Welfare Act shall be available upon request by APHIS officials in order to assess
compliance with standards and regulations.
Correct by: November 26, 2017.
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
